Title: Okra App Framework
Description: The Okra App Framework supports the development of Windows Store applications, in particular those implementing the MVVM pattern.
HomeWiki:
Project Description

The Okra App Framework supports the development of Windows Store applications, in particular those implementing the MVVM pattern.

The Okra App Framework is now hosted on GitHub.

  • Visit the new website at http://okraframework.github.io
  • Browse the source code at http://github.com/OkraFramework
